bobble noun [C]
(FOR HAIR)
UK a small piece of elastic or other material that stretches, sometimes with a decoration attached to it, that is used to hold long hair: She always loved playing with her hair, putting in bobbles and slides. He put a hair bobble around his wrist in case he needed to tie his hair back.
